text: 4.17 Mat 5.12, Lom 8.17-18, 1 Pi 1.6 Mɨŋel keke mɨñɨl dɨpun anɨb okok, tap awl mel, yokɨp won olap nep chɨnop gɨnɨgab. Pen tap anɨb okok chɨnop gɨtep gek, chɨn pel pelnep God man ne alaŋ yonɨgabun. Chɨn nopun, tap teplep chɨn dɨnɨgabun okok, teplep yɨbɨl yenɨgab ak pen, mɨŋel chɨn mɨñɨl dɨpun okok, tap yokɨp tek lɨnɨgab.
